title: L2TP/IPSec VPN in Windows 10
snippet: Add the registry key needed to allow L2TP/IPSec VPNs to connect correctly in Windows 10.reg add HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services\PolicyAgent /v AssumeUDPEncapsulationContextOnSendRule /d 2 /t REG_DWORD
